DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate efficacy intrauterine lidocaine instillation reduce patient discomfort removal `` lose '' intrauterine device ( IUD ) . Methods : This double-blinded , randomize , placebo-controlled trial include 68 woman underwent removal procedure `` lose '' IUD . Thirty-four woman allocate lidocaine group 34 saline group . The main outcome measure intensity pain , immediately , 20 minute procedure , assess visual analog scale . Statistical analysis perform use Friedman 's test Bonferroni correction , Student 's test , 2 .
DOC.brief_title: Anesthetic Efficacy Intrauterine Lidocaine Removal `` Lost '' Intrauterine Device
DOC.criteria: patient undergo minor gynecologic procedure removal `` lose '' IUD . woman history cervical stenosis , know allergy lidocaine , pregnancy , acute cervicitis
